EmailTemplate.subject: Self-service Doesn’t Mean NO Service, Right?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Self-checkout is so much more than the equipment at {{company.Company Name:default=your store}}’s front end. It’s about choice, safety and helping COVID-era customers get in and out fast.
But it’s also about better service. Because you can reallocate associates to tasks that provide a personal shopping experience while offering a speedier checkout.
Watch how NCR self-checkout helped a popular independent grocer improve their customer service. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Are YOU ready for the growing shift to self-service?
Contact your NCR Partner today to get started. If you don’t already work with a technology partner, just reply to this email and we’ll connect you with one.
